name: channel_details
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool youtube_v3_v2.
Tool description: Get youtube data without any youtube data api key
API description: Fetches details of a YouTube channel given its ID and desired parts using the RapidAPI service.

is_id.description: The ID of the YouTube channel to fetch details for.

part.description: The part parameter specifies a comma-separated list of one or more channel resource properties that the API response will include.
